New Records: Eric Haase scored on a double play in the 10th inning as the Brewers improved to 6-5 in extra-inning games
Key Match Events: The Brewers broke a 4-4 tie in the 10th inning on a double play
Devin Williams earned his seventh save in eight tries
TJ Friedl had the game-winning hit on Thursday and extended his streak to 910 at bats without hitting into a double play
Pre-Game Insights: The Reds closer had two consecutive blown saves in his last two appearances
Post-Match Reflections: The Reds dropped to 3-4 in extra-inning games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jackson Chourio twisted his right ankle trying to beat out a ball in the fifth inning but stayed in the game
Wade Miley began throwing and is seeing Dr. Timothy Kremchek in Cincinnati to assess his progress
Hunter Greene has reduced pain from the contusion on his right elbow and began throwing
Others: The Brewers improved to 6-5 in extra-inning games, while the Reds dropped to 3-4
Rhett Lowder will make his Major League debut in the second game of the doubleheader
